alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued December 25 at 2:58PM EST until December 27 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 10 AM EST MONDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28. For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 34 possible. * WHERE...Coastal Citrus County. * WHEN...For the Hard Freeze Warning, until 10 AM EST this morning. For the Freeze Warning, from 3 AM to 10 AM EST Monday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Monday night through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
